This website contains all materials used in BIOL 01301 Fall 2021 at Rowan University with [Dr. Spielman](https://spielmanlab.github.io) (`spielman <at> rowan <dot> edu`). This course meets Tuesday and Thursday 2-3:15 pm and Wednesday 3:30 - 6:15 pm in Science Hall 126.
